DOC.brief_summary: This project evaluate effectiveness Take TIME health promotion campaign . The Take TIME ( Tobacco free , Injury free , Moving daily , Eating healthy ) campaign target parent caregiver child 8 year age . The study help answer follow research question 1 . Are community organization able willing deliver health-promotion campaign target young child ? 2 . What impact Take TIME campaign readiness community support healthy childhood ? 3 . What impact Take TIME campaign awareness achievement healthier lifestyles young child ? 4 . Can health promotion initiatives `` institutionalized '' within Municipality community organization campaign continue beyond study period ? 5 . Are change awareness and/or behaviour related exposure Take TIME campaign ?
DOC.brief_title: A Health Promotion Campaign Targeting Caregivers Young Children
DOC.detailed_description: The Take TIME initiative develop deliver conjunction Township Uxbridge Heart Stroke Foundation Ontario . The Durham Region Health Department , Ministry Health Promotion Sport , 35 school community organization also agree collaborate project activity . The health promotion campaign occur October 15 , 2010 May 31 , 2011 . The campaign activity develop input parent programme/care provider gather plan phase research . The impact Take TIME campaign evaluate two way . The overall readiness community support healthy childhood evaluate use Community Readiness Model , rely series interview key individual leadership position . Awareness current behaviour among community member assess completion telephone survey randomly select household . Each evaluation complete twice , delivery Take TIME campaign . The pre-campaign evaluation complete September 2010 . The post-campaign evaluation , use procedure , complete June 2011 .
